title: With so many thieving Champions now in the roster, when are we gonna get one who steals control?
body:
Zoe steals your Summoner's Spells, Neeko steals your appearance, Sylas steals your ultimate.

Who's it gonna be who can steal control over your Champion (i.e. Mind Control)?

replies.body:
Riot has specifically stated that another player asserting full control over your champion WILL NOT HAPPEN. They understand that is the epitome of un-fun, and have said it won't be implemented in the game.

So give it about a year before CertainlyT "invents" it and they all line up to suck him off for the great design.

current morde does this.

he has to kill you during his ult first, but effectively controls your champion when he does.
That ultimate is getting removed because it's impossible to balance on a Champion like Mordekaiser. Maybe it'll come back on another Champion in the future, though.

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oHEKvZq9,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-06-07T07:46:55.982+0000)
>
> Zoe steals your Summoner's Spells, Neeko steals your appearance, Sylas steals your ultimate.
> 
> Who's it gonna be who can steal control over your Champion (i.e. Mind Control)?

I bet another step will be assuming complete form of champion with everything.

Zoe does not steal Summoner Spells; she retrieves them. If she picks up a Flash because you just used yours, do you no longer have it? No. Nothing was stolen from you.
By the same principle, Neeko does not steal other Champions' appearances; she borrows them.
By the same principle, Sylas does not steal enemy Ultimates; he copies them.

But to address the question: the best I can think of that is already in the game is Charm. When Charmed, you are no longer able to use your abilities, and your enemy gets to influence how you move.
Blitz hook too then I guess. And charm is QSSable afaik. So, you can have some control.
Yeah lets get a champ who can make the enemy run it down. Good idea.

Technically this is already a thing with Crowd Control. Stuns, Roots, Snares, Suppression, Silence, Fear, Knock Up, Knock Back, Hooks, Charms, etc. All remove control from a player over their champion in one or more ways.

But if you're talking about straight up controlling an enemy champion for yourself...no....no to all of that.
